name: Zapier
description: Automation glue. Connects apps like a nervous system. Wild use: build a 'lead-to-cash' conveyor belt that auto-qualifies, follows up, invoices, and books calls while you sleep.

name: Notion
description: Your ops brain in one place. Docs, databases, dashboards. Wild use: turn it into a client-facing 'command center' that makes you look like a 20-person team.

name: Cloudflare Pages
description: Static hosting at warp speed. Wild use: ship micro-sites for every offer angle you test, then kill the losers and scale the winners in hours.

name: Make
description: Visual automation on steroids. Wild use: chain 15 APIs together to build a complete SaaS backend without writing a single line of code.

name: Airtable
description: The database for operators. Wild use: serve as the central brain and content repository for a fully programmatic SEO agency.

name: OpenAI
description: The brain API. Wild use: pass it raw customer support transcripts to automatically identify churn risks and issue partial refunds before they cancel.

name: Anthropic
description: The nuanced thinker. Wild use: feed it a 100-page industry PDF and have it autonomously draft 50 unique, highly-contextual LinkedIn posts.

name: ElevenLabs
description: Hyper-realistic voice cloning. Wild use: hook it to your newsletter to automatically generate a personalized daily podcast payload for premium subscribers.

name: HeyGen
description: AI Avatars that don't look like garbage. Wild use: programmatically generate personalized welcome videos saying the name of every new Stripe customer.

name: Vapi
description: Conversational voice API. Wild use: replace your entire level-1 support team with an agent that answers within 1 second and handles 90% of basic inquiries.

name: Stripe
description: The money router. Wild use: auto-split revenue between 5 different affiliate partners the exact millisecond a customer charge goes through.

name: Kit
description: Email infrastructure for builders. Wild use: trigger a hyper-personalized 14-day sequence the moment someone visits a specific pricing tier on your site.

name: Webflow
description: Visual web development. Wild use: pipe CMS data directly from Airtable to generate 10,000 programmatic SEO landing pages perfectly formatted overnight.

name: Midjourney
description: Image generation mastery. Wild use: automate an entire faceless Instagram account's visual pipeline with zero human input by triggering Discord bots via API.

name: Perplexity
description: The research engine. Wild use: automatically scrape and summarize your competitor's new feature drops into a daily Slack intelligence alert.

name: Retell AI
description: Low-latency voice AI. Wild use: build an inbound sales closer that handles objections faster and with better tonality than a human rep.

name: Bland AI
description: Automated phone calling. Wild use: dial every abandoned cart user with a custom discount offer in real-time before they leave the site.

name: Bubble
description: Full-stack no-code platform. Wild use: launch a fully functional two-sided marketplace in a single weekend and start charging MRR.

name: Framer
description: Ship sites fast. Wild use: build a high-converting landing page, test it with live traffic, and pivot the entire design system in under 24 hours.

name: Phantombuster
description: Data extraction at scale. Wild use: pull 5,000 highly targeted LinkedIn profiles and feed them directly into your cold outreach engine automatically.

name: Apify
description: Web scraping for developers. Wild use: monitor 50 competitor pricing pages daily and dynamically adjust your own Stripe checkout prices to match.

name: Instantly
description: Cold email infrastructure. Wild use: spin up 50 domains and send 10,000 hyper-personalized emails a day with zero deliverability issues.

name: Claude
description: Advanced reasoning model. Wild use: analyze massive datasets of failed sales calls to generate a perfect, probabilistically-optimized objection handling script.

name: Twilio
description: Communication API. Wild use: build a rogue SMS bot that automatically detects when your internet drops and negotiates credit with your ISP.

name: GitHub
description: The code repository. Wild use: automatically deploy new front-end features to Cloudflare the exact second you push an LLM-generated script.
